response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, valued at $1,200,000 to you. Given its exceptional quality and unmatched benefits, we believe it would significantly contribute to your endeavors. We are offering this remarkable item at a special introductory price of $1,100,000, a savings of $100,000 compared to its full value. This offer is valid for a limited time only, so please let us know if you are interested in securing this deal. We look forward to the possibility of working with you and bringing this valuable asset into your possession.", "product_price": 1100000}
